entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Havre St-Pierre
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:50 AM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -19.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Havre-Saint-Pierre Airport 05:00 AM EST Thursday 12 January 2023
Condition: Clear
Temperature: -19.0°C
Pressure: 102.7 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 73 %
Wind Chill: -30
Dewpoint: -22.6°C
Wind: NW 22 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Clearing. High minus 13.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Clearing near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 28 this morning and minus 19 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 18 with temperature rising to minus 7 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning overnight. Wind becoming south 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 18 with temperature rising to minus 7 by morning. Wind chill minus 27 this evening. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Snow. Blowing snow. Windy. Low minus 11. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 12 January 2023
